name: Time Nap
description:
It's a perfect afternoon for a nap. The only problem is, sometimes you can nap for too long.

Try and find all 8 story pages but sleeping until the best times. (Times below but try the game without them first)

Controls = Mouse

Here are the story stages so you can see and hear each part.

Story 1 - year 2023 day 77 hour 14

Story 2 -  year 2023 day 77 hour 16

story 3 - year 2023 day 84 hour 16

story 4 -  year 20225 day 84 hour 22

story 5 - year 2030 day 91 hour 10

story 6 -  year 2035 day 105 hour 10

story 7 -  year 2035 day 135 hour 12

story 8 - year 2085 day 284 hour 18

Story 9 - ???
